mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_id, name, price, description, keyword, image, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id) values (menu_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{keyword}, #{image}, #{hot}, #{ice}, #{categoryId}, #{cafeId})
mapper.update: update menu set name=#{name}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, keyword=#{keyword}, image=#{image} where menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id

select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id order by ${condition} desc

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and m.cafe_id=#{cafeId}) order by ${condition} desc

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and m.category_id=#{categoryId}) order by ${condition} desc

select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and m.cafe_id=#{cafeId} and m.category_id=#{categoryId} order by ${condition} desc

select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and m.name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.description like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.keyword like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m, cafe c where m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id and m.cafe_id=#{cafeId}) where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or description like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or keyword like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update menu set good=good+1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set good=good-1 where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set (sweet, bitter, sour)=(select avg(sweet), avg(bitter), avg(sour) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
update menu set grade=(select avg(grade) from review where menu_id=#{menuId}) where menu_id=#{menuId}
mapper.select: select sweet, bitter, sour from menu where menu_id=#{menuId}

select menu_id, name, price, description, grade, keyword, image, good, click, hot, ice, category_id, cafe_id, sweet, bitter, sour, cafeName from (select m.menu_id, m.name, m.price, m.description, m.grade, m.keyword, m.image, m.good, m.click, m.hot, m.ice, m.category_id, m.cafe_id, m.sweet, m.bitter, m.sour, c.name as cafeName from menu m join cafe c on m.cafe_id = c.cafe_id where m.menu_id!=#{menuId}) where
keyword like '%'||#{item}||'%'
